comment.original:
That was my post, I'm Duncan. I edited it and for some reason it's now by Guest.
Hey there...Disqus. You didn't just become self-aware did you? If so I take back everything I ever wrote about you. I swear I didn't mean any of it.
[edit: I'm really bummed that now I won't be getting credit for using "diacriticals" and "logosyllabic" in the same sentence. Oh look, I did it again. *polishes imaginary medal on chest.]
